title: eBike 20” STEP-THROUGH FATTIE
text:
This nimble and manoeuvrable little electric bike is
super easy to get on and off as a result of its step-through frame design and
just as easy to ride and control even for smaller and younger riders. The front
basket and rear carrier also make it a very practical vehicle for moving small
loads from personal attire to groceries and can even fit a baby seat to the
rear.

 

Bike is fitted with: 

·        
High efficiency 750W brushless geared rear hub
electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 85Nm of ample torque. 

·        
A 21Ah 48V Samsung cell which doesn’t build up
memory and up to 100% larger capacity than the norm and increases range
significantly. 

·        
A 25A heavy duty intelligent controller provides
motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent parameter
setting. 

·        
All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time

·        
10 Speed long range drive train provides a
suitable gear selection for any possible terrain. 

·        
Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface including the beach.

·        
Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge 

·        
Free delivery in South Africa

 

This is a rugged South African designed, tested, and
manufactured EBIKE  

                              

Mobile: 072 869
0153     Email: info@wowbikes.co.za

title: eBike COMMERCIAL ETRIKE
text:
This electric powered work horse is ideal for commercial
movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase
profits and decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and
front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to
ride safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent
choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
specific trike trailer.

 

Trike is fitted with. 

·        
a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front
hub electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 80 Nm of ample torque. 

·        
It comes standard with a maximum size 21Ah 48V
Samsung Lithium Ion battery pack which doesn’t build up memory and increases
range significantly. 

·        
The 25A heavy duty intelligent controller
provides motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent
parameter setting. 

·        
All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time and the 8 Speed drive train provides a suitable gear range
for its application. 

·        
Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface.

·        
Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge

·        
Free delivery in South Africa

 

This is a rugged South
African designed, tested, and manufactured EBIKE

title: 2021 GIANT TALON E+29ER 1 TRAIL BIKE
text: The trail is calling, and here’s how to answer. This balanced, smooth-riding E-bike gives you a natural-feeling boost of power and total control, so you can have more fun and expand your off-road riding capabilities.With a lightweight aluminum frame that blends classic hardtail design with modern E-bike technology, Talon E+ 29 delivers comfort and confidence on off-road terrain. Perfect for bike paths or XC trails, it features a SyncDrive Core motor system that makes those hard climbs easier and encourages you to extend your ride time. It’s designed for a 100mm suspension fork to smooth out the bumps, and its 29-inch wheels give it a stable, balanced ride quality. The side-release EnergyPak battery is integrated into the frame and can be easily removed for charging. And the RideControl ONE control lets you adjust settings as you ride.MotorGiant SyncDrive CoreControllerGiant RideControl One ANT+DisplayGiant RideControlOne ANT+BatteryGiant EnergyPak 500Wh, Side-ReleaseSizesS, M, L, XL ,XXLColorsBalsam GreenFrameALUXX aluminum, Overdrive 1½ - 1?" head tube, integrated KS18 kickstand mountForkSR Suntour XCR 32 LO-R Boost 29 100mm travel, Tapered 1½ - 1?" steerer, lockoutShockN/AHandlebarGiant Connect TR Riser 31.8x690~750mmStemGiant ContactSeatpostGiant 30.9mm, 2-bolt Micro Adjustable, Forged AluminiumSaddleGiant SportPedalsAluminum PlatformShiftersShimano DeoreFront Derailleur-Rear DerailleurShimano Deore, 10-Speed, Shadow+BrakesShimano BR-MT200, hydraulic disc, 180mmBrake LeversShimano BL-MT200CassetteShimano HG50-10, 11-42T, 10-SpeedChainKMC e.10 Sport, e-bike optimizedCranksetForged Alloy minimal Q-factor, 36TBottom BracketN/ARimsGiant GX03VHubsGiant eTracker Sport, [F] 15mm Thru-Axle [R] 9mm QR, e-bike optimizedSpokesStainless steelTiresMaxxis Rekon 29x2.4" Wire Bead 60TPIExtrasGiant EnergyPak 4A Fast ChargerWeightThe most accurate way to determine any bike’s weight is to have your local dealer weigh it for you. text: Steep climbs, technical descents, longer days on the trail. With a smooth suspension setup and a seamless boost of pedaling support, this E-bike gives you the power and technology to ride the trails you dream about.Designed with trail-friendly geometry, Stance E+ helps beginner or intermediate trail riders experience off-road E-bike riding at its best. Its lightweight, strong and stiff ALUXX SL aluminum frame with FlexPoint suspension makes tricky singletrack trails easier to ride. It features 120mm of rear suspension travel and 130mm up front, plus the stable, nimble ride quality of 29-inch wheels. The SyncDrive Sport motor delivers 350 percent tunable support ratios through the Giant E-bike App. The new RideControl ONE with EVO display compatibility has integrated handlebar support buttons for improved ergonomic control. title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. title: EPIC-READY 2018 LARGE GIANT ANTHEM ADVANCED PRO 1
text: EPIC-READY 2018 LARGE GIANT ANTHEM ADVANCED PRO 1I bought the Giant new for R84K at the end of 2018 and immediately added the following extras:· Upgrade - LYNE Dropper Seat Post· Upgrade - Carbon Handlebar: Carbon· Upgrade - Carbon Wheels: Giant XCR 1 carbon· Upgrade - Crankset: 32 Oval· Upgrade - Giant Double Bottle cage…..and then I did the CAPE EPIC in March 2019 with this stunning machine….!!I had a flawless Epic with no mechanical issues whatsoever and immediately entered for the 2020 Cape Epic afterwards, which didn’t happen due to Covert (The event was cancelled a day before registration)The Giant was as ready as new – I spent R12 000 on a proper service in order to be ready for the 2020 Epic. Al the pivot bearings and wheel bearings was replaces as well as all the cables, fluids and brake pads, and the shocks was properly serviced as well, all done by Andrew Stokes in Cape TownNow I need to sell this Dream GiantFrame: Advanced-Grade Composite, Maestro SuspensionFork: Fox 32 Float SC Performance EliteRear Shock: Fox Float Performance Elite RemoteRear Derailleur: Sram GX Eagle (12 speed)Shifters: SRAM GX Eagle, 1x12Crankset: 32T OvalCassette: SRAM GX Eagle, 10x50Brakes: Sram Level hydraulic brakeWheels: Giant XCR 1 carbonTyres: Rear: MAXXI RECON RACE 2.35, Front: MAXXI RECON RACE 2.35Stem: Giant Contact SLHandlebar: Upgraded to Race Face carbonSeatpost: LYNE Dropper Seat PostExtras on the bike:Lyne Dropper SeatpostCarbon fiber handlebarSingle-stage lock-out for both front and rear shocks32 Teeth Oval CrankGiant Twin Bottle Cage worth R1000 with two brand new Epic Water BottlesWell stocked Toolkit, including Multitool with Chain BreakerSlightly used white BELL helmet2 Rider's shirts, brand new and still in plastic, sponsored for the 2020 Cape Epic by MARGOT SWISS INTERNATIONALBike Stand (The one in the photos)The price is not negotiable as I don’t want to sell the Giant, I have to….and a friendly message to all fraudsters not to try to con me as I will not let the Giant go before payment is secured...!!

title: Scott Fuga Rev MTB Helmet (59-61cm) *NEAT*
text:
Scott Fuga Rev MTB Helmet in excellent like new condition, used only a few times. Neat, barely any signs of use.

This helmet retails at over R2.5k!

Description "Fuga Plus 2021 Cycling Helmet"

Perfect helmet for high demands in cyclocross and road cycling. This helmet is characterised by MIPS brain protection system, Halo 3D adjustment system and an unparalleled ventilation. The removable visor changes your look when needed for MTB or road biking.

light and stable In-Mold construction with light Polycarbonate Microshell outer shell

the integrated MIPS protection system absorbs and dispenses rotational forces in case of a diagonal impact Convincing protection from traumatic brain injuries!

very good ventilation thanks to inside air flow channels and large holes in front and back

excellent comfort due to innovative HALO one-hand adjustment system which allows for easy individual adjustment to the shape of your head

bacteriostatic X-Static liner pads

removable visor

reflective sticker

sizes: M (55-59), L (59-61)

weight: 280 g (size M)

DELIVERY/MEET-UP CAN BE ARRANGED.

title: Thule ClipOn3 *LIKE NEW*
text:
Retails for R3000+ at major retailer, you can get it in almost new condition for only R2000.

Thule's Clip On 9104 Bike Rack ia an easy-to-use, hanging-style trunk bike rack designed for station wagons and hatchbacks and will store 3 bikes with relative ease. It is easily mountable due to Thule's unique snap-on system and the rubber coated components ensure that your bike and car paint will not be damaged by this bike rack in any way.

Key Features:
- All parts in contact with the car and bikes are coated with rubber for extra protection.
- Easy to mount to the rear door with a unique snap-on system.
- Quickly folds for easy storage.
- Possible to attach Thule Light board 976.
- Use Thule Bike Frame Adapter 982 for fitting of bikes with non-standard frames (e.g. ladies’ bikes, BMXs, downhill bikes)
- This product does not have universal fit and it comes in two versions (9103 and 9104) having different tube diameters fitting different car models
- Max load capacity is 45kg with each bike weighing in at a maximum of 15kg each
- Dimensions(cm): 57 x 82 x 116 (Folded: 57 x 18 x 117)
- Weight: 7.1kg

BASED IN FLORIDA NORTH.

title: WOW eBIKE - COMMERCIAL ETRIKE
text:
This electric powered work horse is ideal for commercial
movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase
profits and decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and
front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to
ride safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent
choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
specific trike trailer.

 

Trike is fitted with. 

·        
a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front
hub electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 80 Nm of ample torque. 

·        
It comes standard with a maximum size 21Ah 48V
Samsung Lithium Ion battery pack which doesn’t build up memory and increases
range significantly. 

·        
The 25A heavy duty intelligent controller
provides motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent
parameter setting. 

·        
All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time and the 8 Speed drive train provides a suitable gear range
for its application. 

·        
Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface.

·        
Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge

·        
Free delivery in South Africa

 

This is a rugged South
African designed, tested, and manufactured EBIKE

easy to get on and off as a result of its step-through frame design and just as
easy to ride and control even for smaller and younger riders. The front basket
and rear carrier also make it a very practical vehicle for moving small loads
from personal attire to groceries and can even fit a baby seat to the rear.

title: E BIKE COMMERCIAL ETRIKE
text:
This electric powered work horse is ideal for commercial movement of
  small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase profits and
  decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and front
  suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to ride
  safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent choice
  as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
  specific trike trailer.
   
  Trike is fitted with; 
  ·        
  a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front hub electric motor with a
  reduction ratio of 1:5 and 80 Nm of ample torque. 
  ·        
  It comes standard with a maximum size 21Ah 48V Samsung Lithium Ion
  battery pack which doesn’t build up memory and increases range significantly.
  
  ·        
  The 25A heavy duty intelligent controller provides motor and controller
  temperature protection as well as intelligent parameter setting. 
  ·        
  All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe stopping every time and the
  8 Speed drive train provides a suitable gear range for its application.

  Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent traction on
  any surface.Mobile:

GIANT ANTHEM ADVANCED PRO 1I bought the Giant new for R84K at the end of 2018 and immediately

2019 with this stunning machine….!!I had a flawless Epic with no mechanical issues whatsoever and
immediately entered for the 2020 Cape Epic afterwards, which didn’t happen due to Covert
(The event was cancelled a day before registration)The Giant was as ready as new – I spent R12 000 on a proper
service in order to be ready for the 2020 Epic. Al the pivot bearings and wheel bearings was replaces
as well as all the cables, fluids and brake pads, and the shocks was properly
serviced as well, all done by Andrew Stokes in Cape TownNow I need to sell this Dream GiantFrame:  Advanced-Grade

carbonTyres:  Rear: MAXXI RECON

text:
The Giant Escape 2 Matte Black/Neon Green, size Medium.

TRANSPORTATION, FITNESS AND FUN. ESCAPE IS ALL THESE THINGS AND MORE. CHOOSE YOUR MISSION, HOP ON AND GO.

With its lightweight ALUXX aluminum frame and smooth, stable 700c wheels, Escape is your ticket to on-road versatility. Ride city streets or country roads. For commuting, fitness, or just for the fun of it. Confident upright geometry and a wide range of gears give it a sporty ride quality. Whatever road or path you choose, Escape is always up for the adventure.

ALUXX-grade butted aluminum frame

title: Giant Talon MTB 27.5 Medium
text: Men's Giant Talon 27.5 in size Medium ready to be snapped up.Bike has only been used to commute to work and back (16km each way) pretty much every day. Yes a couple of scratches here and there but nothing from a fall or accident. the shock has been locked out all this time some pretty much brand new / no usage at all.3 x 8 Speed Shimano gear set and crank with Tektro Xiuriga disc brakes. Has an an extra length seat post and will come with the standard flat pedals and original Giant saddle (unused) that the bike came with so yes NOT that which you see in the photos. Will also come with an extra brand new tyre and some tubes.Bike has just been serviced at Hatton Cycles where new cables, (inners and outer) and brake pads were fitted.The price is negotiable within reason of course and payment is by cash only. Viewing after 6pm Mon, Wed, Thurs and Fri. If your interested, please send me a WhatsApp.

Selling this Beautiful 2019 Specialized Stumpjumper in almost perfect condition. The frame has been wrapped since day one with only one or 2 marks. Brand new 2021 Fox 36 fork. Overall everything is in amazing condition and photos cant do it justice.

title: Multifuntional Adult Tricycle(with basket) #As New!
text:
This lovely red Adult Tricycle, as in the second image, is in NEW condition - only used once or twice up and down the street. 
Perfect condition! 
Great gift for young and old - from young people who want to save on fuel cost to pop in at the shops, to taking the little ones for a fun ride, to elderly cyclists wanting to continue in physical activities or an active elderly person who likes to go to the shops, beach or walking the dogs. Can also make the perfect gift to disabled children or adults. 
Only reason for sale is that it was a birthday gift of a family member who rode it twice down the street - she sadly passed away before she could really use it. Top of the range tricycle - Selling New at Olympic Cycles @ R11000.

title: 2010 GT Sensor 1.0 Small
text:
Size S 
Upgraded to 2 x 9 Group, 27.5" wheels.

Fox F series Fork, Float shock, 100mm front and rear.
XT derailleur and shifters.
LX hollow crank.
Avid Elixer brakes.
WTB 27.5" rims

Fork and shock serviced within last 500km
Bike has been used, but in very good condition.
Perfect for a kid who wants to get onto a small frame dual sus bike or for someone who of small stature who wants a dual sus, bit does not want to spend a lot. 

I am personally a big fan of the I drive suspension geometry and have had 0 maintenance needs on this - it is still perfect. Coupled with the Fox fork and shock, it offers a very plush ride. Biggest plus is short, technical climbs. Biggest neg is probably that it is a bit more nervous going down hill (I enjoyed it though) and mud clearance. 

Serious offers will be considered.

title: Ryder Bora 2.0 UK9 + MTB Shimano Pedals + Cleates
text:
Retails for R1800 at Cyclelab. You can get it for half price with a free set of used MTB Pedals.

The Ryder Bora 2.0 MTB Cycling Shoe offers the comfort and quick adjustment provided by a A-Top dial. With a single dial and a set-and-forget front strap, it should be convenient for the rider to be able to slip on this shoe and hit the trails. The A-top dial offers 1mm adjustment increments when tightening with macro release function. The co-moulded nylon and rubber lugged outsole provides high traction and durability to this shoe, ensuring that it will be suitable for varying terrains.

Features:

- Rigid MTB sole to protect the rider and increase power transfer from the rider to the pedals
- A-top fastening system for an adjustable, custom fit
- Breathable mesh to keep the rider cool
- Rubber non-slip heel lining to increase the stability of the rider

BASED IN FLORIDA NORTH.

title: Titan Whopper Expert Fat bike
text:
MENU

Hardtail Mountain Bikes

Manage your Ad

Tap here to see the options

￼



Size
L

Frame Material
Aluminium

This bike is all about versatility. Going away for the weekend inland or by the sea this bike is a blast on trails or sand. Why spend 30k upwards on a full suspension bike or 10k on a hardtail with low spec components if fun is what you are looking for from a bike. This bike could practically be sold as new. It has Shimano hydraulic disc brakes for some serious stopping power. Shimano 3 x 9 drive terrain which has a heap of range. This bike is a size large but could easily fit a rider looking for a medium. If you are looking for a fun healthy life style and wanting a quality bike look no further. Bike comes with a wireless cycle computer.
The Expert has been designed and put together by engineers that definitely know their stuff. For instance, the aluminium frame has been hydro formed to insure strength, while a steel rigid fork keeps bike well balanced. The drivetrain was an excellent choice, with Shimano Acera shifters and Alvio rear derailleur. Plus, the Prowheel Suolo cranks and Shimano FD front derailleur. This drivetrain is the perfect match for the Expert, in terms of what the bike is meant to do, a 3×9 match up, will do the trick

title: Adult Tricycle For Sale #AS NEW!
text:
This lovely red Adult Tricycle, as in the second image, is in NEW condition - only used once or twice up and down the street. 
Perfect condition! 
Great gift for young and old - from young people who want to save on fuel cost to pop in at the shops, to taking the little ones for a fun ride, to elderly cyclists wanting to continue in physical activities or an active elderly person who likes to go to the shops, beach or walking the dogs. Can also make the perfect gift to disabled children or adults. 
Only reason for sale is that it was a birthday gift of a family member who rode it twice down the street - she sadly passed away before she could really use it. 
Asking price is R9000, but willing to accomodate offers up to R8000. 

If interested kindly contact via WhatsApp on 0792473733 to arrange for viewing and collection. 
Thank you.

title: Contact me for what bicycle fits you best
text:
Don't end up buying a bike and needing to buy again after a few months because you didn't know what to get. 

Are you looking to buy a Mountain bike, yet unsure of what to look for? 

Or have you bought one and doesn't feel comfortable, maybe a bit slack or to twitchy. 

Is your back hurting a lot, hands getting numb and upper legs cramping in early stages of exercise?

Are you comfortable on your bike?

I advise on multiple aspects, resell value, desired brands, style and size. 

Some types and styles are more adequate for certain terrains and environments!

Before you buy something you don't know enough about, send me your desired bike, the daily use or styles you'd like to endeavor and i can confirm that it's a good choice or if a different bicycle would be more suitable. 

And list some reason why it's not suitable and why you shouldn't buy it and rather revert to a different bicycle all together. 

This service is free and we will book a meeting or just talk over the phone. Or at a local area, my or your house and we will discuss in person (with a social distancing aspect) why, why not and what rather with examples. 

Mr Elezar Kruger 
0659880098 
Or email 
Eleckruger@gmail.com 

Kind regards
Elezar

text:
Electric Mountain Biking with Cape Lion e-Rides offers the most e-xciting way to get around mountain biking trails this summer - e-MTB! If you are new to e-biking, it's like cycling, but without the grind. 
E-MTBs offer a little more push uphills and little more fun on the downhills. If you haven't tried it yet, what are you waiting for?
Discover the trails of Constantia, Silvermine, Table Mountain National Park and more.  
OUR E-MTBsHard Tail or Full Suspension available

Maximum rider weight, 150 Kg

Minimum age, 14 years old

WE DELIVER!Hout Bay & surrounds including Camps Bay, CBD, Constantia, Bishopscourt, Newlands and Noordhoek e-bike delivery is FREE. (Noordhoek delivery free, but toll gate charges apply).
